field.name: summary
field.value: Scaffolding is not using view supplied by the user if using ViewArea or Single Class

field.name: description
field.value:
I wasn't able to find any fixes for this so I'm reporting it. I'm using version 1.0.3.4333 of Castle and It seems to me that the only situation which overriding a scaffolding view works is when we have two or more scaffolding classes (..listClassName.rails) and we don't use Areas for view. It doesn't work either when I use Area or have single scaffolding class.
Update: I was able to override it by moving view files out of Area folder and renaming them to listModelName.vm (even if there is only one scaffolding model). Renaming view file is ok but I think the need for moving them out of area folder is a bug.
